TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IisTraceWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider

Docs.summary: Represents an event provider that routes ASP.NET tracing events to the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring enables administrators to manage deployed Web applications. The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the event types that obtain health-status data and the provider types that process this data. It also contains supporting types that help you manage health events.
The IisTraceWebEventProvider class is a customized health-event provider that processes ASP.NET tracing events by routing them through the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tracing infrastructure. This routing occurs only when tracing is enabled in ASP.NET.
IisTraceWebEventProvider is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > This class does not route [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] trace events into ASP.NET page events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The IisTraceWebEventProvider constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. It is called by ASP.NET.
IisTraceWebEventProvider is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

Docs.summary: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the event log. This occurs regardless of how much time has elapsed since the last event was written or how many events are in the buffer. The time of the last written event is reset to the time of the flushing action.
Flush is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);

Docs.param: The name of the provider as specified in the configuration system.
A collection that contains the initialization values that are specified in the configuration system.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the with the data that is necessary to process events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Initialize is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ProcessEvent is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

Docs.summary: Performs tasks that are associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The method performs tasks that enable the application to end normally. An example of such a task is closing resources.
Shutdown is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
